meanings.definition: A sacred drink in Sikhism believed to have spiritual powers.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest poured amrits into the cup.
meanings.sent2: The amrits was passed around to all the worshippers.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they pretended to drink the magical amrits.
meanings.sent4: The amrits flowed like a river of blessings through the community.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sweet amrits lingered in the air, filling the temple with peace.

meanings.definition: The nectar of immortality in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that only the gods can taste the divine amrits.
meanings.sent2: The amrits was hidden in a golden chalice deep within the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to steal a sip of the precious amrits.
meanings.sent4: The amrits sparkled like liquid gold under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The amrits granted eternal life to those who were pure of heart.
